Title: Provides that an employer may not take retaliatory action against a person who protests against or discloses any bribery or attempted bribery of a public official
Summary: Provides that an employer may not take retaliatory action against a person who protests against or discloses any bribery or attempted bribery of a public official.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to retaliatory action by employers
